summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6271 for the improvement of South Warsaw St. from Rainier Ave. South to approximately 100 feet east of 48th Ave. South; and certain other streets, avenues and easements; by constructing sanitary sewers and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 91577, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
